item.title: Distributed Machine Learning: How Does it Work?
item.dc:creator: Bruce Mauger
item.description: Distribution has become essential to training large models. Modern machine learning frameworks provide drop-in distribution, but few understand how these work -- and why they might be slowing down training.

item.title: Boosting for Causal Effect Estimation
item.dc:creator: Bruce Mauger
item.description: Can you boost when you don't have labels?
